scripts.readme: echo use these commands to learn more about a topic: && echo 'yarn readme-doc' && echo 'yarn readme-setup' && echo 'yarn readme-imp' && echo 'yarn readme-tart' && echo 'yarn readme-test'
scripts.readme-setup: echo && echo setup scripts configure project dependencies && echo setup-yarn installs yarn && echo setup-rust-nix installs rust for macOS and linux && echo setup-rust-win prints the URLs to for Windows rust installers
scripts.setup-yarn: npm install -g yarn && yarn && echo run 'yarn setup-rust-nix' for linux / macOS or use the installer from https://win.rustup.rs/x86_64 for 64-bit Windows or https://win.rustup.rs/i686 for 32-bit Windows to finish setup
scripts.setup-rust-win: echo 'Windows users must install Rust using the installer from https://win.rustup.rs/x86_64 or https://win.rustup.rs/i686'
scripts.readme-doc: echo && echo doc scripts facilitate documentation of the project && echo doc generates automatic documentation using the typedoc npm library
scripts.doc: yarn tart-clean && yarn && yarn tart-pretty && yarn typedoc
scripts.readme-test: echo && echo test scripts facilitate testing of the project && echo test-watch watches the project for changes and runs tests automatically && echo test-cover checks automatic test coverage
scripts.readme-imp: echo && echo imp scripts perform convenience features for this project && echo imp-up deploys this repo using docker-compose.yml && echo imp-new clears your data and deploys a fresh copy && echo imp-down ends that deployment
scripts.imp-new: yarn imp-docker-images && yarn imp-down && yarn tart-clean && yarn && [ -d mariadbdata ] || mkdir mariadbdata && yarn imp-down && rm -rf backend mariadbdata && yarn tart-build && yarn imp-up
scripts.readme-tart: echo && echo tart scripts perform convenience features for the tart template && echo tart starts a live development environment tauri app && echo tart-build builds the optimized frontend && echo tart-bundle builds the distributable tauri binary for your OS && echo tart-zip zips the build folder for transfer to a production webserver && echo tart-clean cleans the repo artifacts && echo tart-rustup updates the rust dependencies && echo tart-icon builds icon files from the image at src-tauri/icons/app-icon.png && echo tart-updater-sign creates the signature for the tauri autoupdater && echo tart-prep changes the tsconfig.json to run ts-node scripts && echo tart-pretty runs prettier && echo tart-cleanup changes the tsconfig.json back to the original tsconfig.json
scripts.tart-bundle: yarn tart-clean && yarn && yarn tart-build && mkdir output && mv src-tauri/target/release/bundle/* output && yarn tart-zip
scripts.tart-zip: yarn tart-prep && yarn ts-node src/scripts/utility/webzip.ts && yarn tart-cleanup
scripts.tart-clean: rm -rf .VSCodeCounter build coverage node_modules output src-tauri/target package-lock.json yarn.lock yarn-error.log src-tauri/Cargo.lock
scripts.tart-clean-all: yarn tart-clean && yarn tart-clean-db && yarn tart-clean-api
scripts.tart-rustup: yarn tart-clean && yarn && cd src-tauri && rustup update && cargo update && cd ..
